name: A Mob Slime*
description:
The Full Title: A lost mutated mob slime that doesn't know it has acquired a legendary skill and is trying to find a purpose but it accidently conquered the dungeon that an isekai MC from a different universe was supposed to conquer. But why is it like this? Because the developers like slimes.

Description: A 2d scroller action pixel platformer where the player plays a slime and explores a cave dungeon that is infested with mythical cave animals and traps. They will fight monsters, bosses and are able to unlock levels by defeating bosses. The narrative? The title is pretty self-explanatory.

(BUG: Reload if you die and the game does not transition to the 'You Died' Screen)

Lead Designer/ Project Management: Wong Ying Fu

Sound/Level Designer: Leong Kevin 

Lead Artist: Kevin Ng Kai Weng

Background/Game Artist: Cryst Ng

Game Programmers: Danial Ikhwan, Lim Yunlyn

 Some Art and Music/SFX were taken from online resources.

Most were done ourselves.

Stencyl was used as the game engine.

This game was made in 48 hours as part of a Game Jam.
